code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=_ref=>{let{setUserEmail}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSignup=()=>{if(!email){alert("Enter a valid email!");return;}setUserEmail(email);alert("Login successful!");if(email==="12214064@nitkkr.ac.in"){navigate("/admin-dashboard");}else{navigate("/");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Signup/Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter Gmail ID",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSignup,children:"Sign In"})]});};export default Signup;
